original_text: And they were saying to one another, “Who will roll away the stone for us from the entrance of the tomb?”
korean_text: 서로 말하되 누가 우리를 위하여 무덤 문에서 돌을 굴려 주리요 하더니

sentences.original_text: And they were saying to one another,
“Who will roll away the stone for us
from the entrance of the tomb?”
